title: JinjaHook
description:
Hook for jinja templates. If given an `output`, the rendered contents are output to
 a file, otherwise the rendered contents are output as a string.

template.title: Template
template.description: Path to the template to render relative to `file_system_loader`.

output.title: Output
output.description: Path to the output the template.

extra_context.title: Extra Context
extra_context.description: Extra context update the global context to render with.

render_context.title: Render Context
render_context.description: A render context that invalidates the default context.

additional_context.title: Additional Context
additional_context.description: A map to use as additional context when rendering.

file_system_loader.title: File System Loader
file_system_loader.description: List of paths or string path to directory with templates to load from. [Docs](https://jinja.palletsprojects.com/en/3.0.x/api/#jinja2.FileSystemLoader).

ProviderList.title: ProviderList
ProviderList.description:
Provider list object that on instantiation imports native (shipping wit tackle box),
settings (declared in ~/.tackle/settings.yaml), and local (in a local hooks
directory).

title: GenerateHook
description:
Hook for generating project outputs. Recursively renders all files and folders in a
given target directory to an output. If there is a "templates" directory and a file
or directory that matches the `templates` input param, use that as target.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Path or list of paths to a templatable directory or file to recursively render the contents.

output.title: Output
output.description: Path to put the output file(s).

copy_without_render.title: Copy Without Render
copy_without_render.description: List of path to files to only copy and not render.

render_context.title: Render Context
render_context.description: A render context that invalidates the default context.

extra_context.title: Extra Context
extra_context.description: A map / list of maps to use as extra context when rendering. Lists inputs are merged together as lists themselves don't make sense.

file_system_loader.title: File System Loader
file_system_loader.description: List of paths or string path to directory with templates to load from. [Docs](https://jinja.palletsprojects.com/en/3.0.x/api/#jinja2.FileSystemLoader).

ProviderList.title: ProviderList
ProviderList.description:
Provider list object that on instantiation imports native (shipping wit tackle box),
settings (declared in ~/.tackle/settings.yaml), and local (in a local hooks
directory).
